jobTitle: Senior Analyst - Growth & Purpose - Technical Business Specialist - Hyderabad
jobDescription:
Position Summary
                    








Senior Analyst – Data & ProductsAbout Deloitte Brand Marketing & CommunicationsDeloitte’s Brand, Marketing & Communications (BM&C) organization seeks innovative creatives, strategic marketers, and collaborative leaders to drive business growth and digital transformation. Join a team that blends creativity, business acumen, strategic thinking, and Deloitte’s strong brand equity to deliver impactful marketing solutions. Thrive in a diverse, supportive environment where you leverage cultural trends, emerging technologies, and bold ideas to challenge the status quo. Be part of Deloitte’s journey to turn visionary concepts into marketing success.About Instrumentation TeamThe Instrumentation Team, part of Deloitte’s Brand Marketing & Communications organization, makes marketing smarter and more effective by harnessing data, analytics, and cutting-edge technology. Specializing in data science, machine learning, GenAI, and advanced analytics, the team delivers actionable insights and AI-powered solutions that elevate marketing strategy and execution. This role is ideal for a high-performing professional who thrives on data-driven decision making, demonstrates strong analytical and critical thinking skills, and collaborates seamlessly across teams, geographies, and leadership levels. If you are passionate about transforming marketing through analytics and innovation, and are excited to shape how Deloitte connects with audiences, the Instrumentation Team is where your talent will drive measurable impact.What you will doThis role will interface with a variety of teams within the Clients, Marketing, Accounts, and Growth organizations and the broader firm. This individual will be expected to demonstrate strong project & and stakeholder management skills, a solid understanding of data warehouse and data visualization, and sharp business acumen to build and implement solutions that affect real change and add tangible functional value to our end users. The professional would also be responsible for mining and analysis of marketing performance data, creating advanced queries and reports, and working closely with the other teams in support of cross business brand to demand marketing programs. This individual will be expected to demonstrate both technical and business acumen to build and implement solutions that affect real change and add tangible functional value to our end users.Key responsibilities:· Strong Data Analysis: Demonstrate expertise in SQL, ETL processes, data warehouse management, and data architecture to design, build, and maintain robust data solutions.· Execute Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) using BI tools, Python to enabe deeper statistical insights and predictive analytics· Develop, and prototype data validation and automation workflows with Alteryx/Python.· Stakeholder Communication: Proactively communicate with business stakeholders to understand business and functional requirements, translating them into clear technical specifications.· Independent Work Management: Manage own workload independently, providing regular updates via Agile ceremonies (Microsoft ADO) and team calls.· Data Issue Resolution: Identify, investigate, and resolve data issues; recommend improvements for data quality and alignment.· Reporting Support: Provide analytical and reporting support for marketing campaigns, industries, and post-campaign analysis.· Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams to support effective visualization and communication of analytics results.· Presentation and Executive Communications: Present findings and recommendations to stakeholders, ensuring clarity for non-technical audiences.· Process Improvement: Contribute to the development of scalable processes for insight mining and decision support.Skills and Abilities:· 3 to 5 years of relevant experience in data analytics· Advanced proficiency in SQL, ETL tools (e.g., Alteryx), data warehouse management, and data architecture.· Strong exploratory data analysis (EDA) skills.· Experience with foundational data science concepts and workflows (statistical analysis, supervised/unsupervised learning, model evaluation).· Experience with Python-based data science libraries (pandas, scikit-learn, matplotlib, seaborn, etc.)· Bonus: Hands-on experience creating and deploying simple machine learning models.· Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)· Good people interaction skills: ability to manage complex stakeholder requests· Effective presentation and storyboarding skills· Knowledge of digital marketing concepts and measurement tools and techniques.· Understands and have working experience in data warehouse management, data architecture, and development of business intelligence applications and reporting.· Executive presence with the ability to present ideas, make recommendations, provide rationale,· Prior experience working on a virtual team within a highly matrixed organization, preferably for a global corporation or professional services firm· Microsoft Office Skills (e.g., Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook); familiarity with integrating various technologies to support marketing effortsEducation· MBA / master’s degree would be an added advantageWork Timings· 2.00 PM to 11 PM· Location – Hyderabad Office#EagerForExcellence#EAG-M&R






Our purposeDeloitte’s purpose is to make an impact that matters for our people, clients, and communities. At Deloitte, purpose is synonymous with how we work every day. It defines who we are. Our purpose comes through in our work with clients that enables impact and value in their organizations, as well as through our own investments, commitments, and actions across areas that help drive positive outcomes for our communities. 






Our people and cultureOur inclusive culture empowers our people to be who they are, contribute their unique perspectives, and make a difference individually and collectively. It enables us to leverage different ways of thinking, ideas and perspectives, and bring more creativity and innovation to help solve our clients’ most complex challenges. This makes Deloitte one of the most rewarding places to work.






Professional developmentAt Deloitte, professionals have the opportunity to work with some of the best and discover what works best for them. Here, we prioritize professional growth, offering diverse learning and networking opportunities to help accelerate careers and enhance leadership skills. Our state-of-the-art DU: The Leadership Center in India, located in Hyderabad, represents a tangible symbol of our commitment to the holistic growth and development of our people. Explore DU: The Leadership Center in India.






Benefits to help you thriveAt Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. Our comprehensive rewards program helps us deliver a distinctly Deloitte experience that helps that empowers our professionals to thrive mentally, physically, and financially—and live their purpose. To support our professionals and their loved ones, we offer a broad range of benefits. Eligibility requirements may be based on role, tenure, type of employment and/ or other criteria. Requisition code: 325121

jobTitle: Senior Experience Designer/UX Product Designer - Assistant Manager
jobDescription:
Position Summary
                    








Senior UX Product Designer – L4 Role Overview: As a Senior UX Product Designer for the Deloitte DT-US Product Engineering team, you will be tasked with solving complex challenges through elegant, user-centered design solutions. Our ideal candidate is a versatile design generalist with deep expertise in interaction design. You should feel equally at home shaping big-picture workflow and strategy as you are prototyping details visual and interaction elements. This role requires a proven track-record of experience-driven innovation. Join us in shaping the future of design! Key Responsibilities: •	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design engaging and intuitive user experiences using an iterative lean UX approach of continuous improvement •	Create big-picture workflows as well as execute detailed visual & interaction design •	Create user-friendly designs that enhance usability and optimize the overall user experience, while identifying design challenges and proposing elegant, effective solutions. •	Produce all design assets including concept designs, user flows, wireframes, user scenarios, journey maps, mockups, etc. that support intuitive and seamless user interactions. •	Conduct heuristic evaluations of existing products to identify areas for improvement. •	Develop innovative approaches to complex design problems, presenting your ideas through mockups, presentations, and detailed design specifications. •	Work within a small, empowered product team to balance business objectives with user needs, collaborating with engineers to ensure smooth implementation of designs. •	Understand business priorities together with user needs to create impactful experiences •	Uphold high standards of user-centered design, iterating quickly and testing designs to enhance usability and consistency across touchpoints. •	Collaborate with user researchers to inform design decisions, contributing to studies that explore unresolved user interface issues and opportunities. •	Continuously challenge design effectiveness, monitor behavioral analytics, and suggest improvements to optimize user experiences. •	Contribute to the overall design framework, ensuring consistent design language and experiences across the product suite. •	Ask insightful questions, take calculated risks, and champion new ideas to drive innovation. •	Stay up to date with the latest UX trends, best practices, and methodologies in areas like information architecture, interaction design, and usability. •	Operate effectively in both collaborative environments with other UX designers and autonomously when acting as the sole UX designer on a product squad. •	Deliver high-quality UX work on time, showcasing your expertise in user experience design and detailed interactions. Key Qualifications: •	5-8 years as an interaction or product designer with a strong track record of crafting user interfaces that engage and delight users. •	Deep understanding of interactive design principles, consistently delivering simple, elegant, and aesthetically pleasing interfaces rooted in usability and accessibility. •	Proficient in designing for both desktop and mobile platforms, with a focus on responsive and adaptive design that enhances the user experience across devices. •	Driven by a passion for solving user pain points, leveraging design thinking and user feedback to create seamless experiences. •	Highly creative and analytical, able to navigate between strategic vision and hands-on execution, ensuring solutions are innovative and intuitive. •	Collaborative and open-minded, eager to contribute to team success while continuously learning and iterating on designs based on feedback. •	Thrives in dynamic, fast-paced environments, iterating quickly to incorporate feedback and improve outcomes. •	Deeply passionate about UX and innovation, constantly exploring new design trends and methodologies to stay ahead. •	Strong organizational and time-management skills, able to prioritize tasks effectively and work independently to meet deadlines. •	Proficient in industry-standard UX tools, including Sketch, Adobe CC, Figma, Axure, InVision, UXPin, and Balsamiq, ensuring efficient design workflows. •	Degree in Interaction Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Cognitive Psychology, or a related field  A strong portfolio or samples of work demonstrating experience and UX skills is required The team: US Deloitte Technology Product Engineering has modernized software and product delivery, creating a scalable, cost-effective model that focuses on value/outcomes that leverages a progressive and responsive talent structure. As Deloitte’s primary internal development team, Product Engineering delivers innovative digital solutions to businesses, service lines, and internal operations with proven bottom-line results and outcomes. It helps power Deloitte’s success. It is the engine that drives Deloitte, serving many of the world’s largest, most respected companies. We develop and deploy cutting-edge internal and go-to-market solutions that help Deloitte operate effectively and lead in the market. Our reputation is built on a tradition of delivering with excellence. How You will Grow: At Deloitte, our professional development plans focus on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths to do their best work every day and excel in everything they do.

Requisition code: 325057

jobTitle: USI- EH26- Cyber Security IAM- Analyst
jobDescription:
Position Summary
                    








Analyst (U1) – Technology & Digital Services – Identity & Access Management Analyst, Deloitte Support Services India Private LimitedOrganisation SummaryAt Deloitte, we’re all about collaboration. And nowhere is this more apparent than among our 2,000-strong internal services team. With our combined specialist skills, we provide all the essential support and advice our client-facing colleagues need, right across the firm. This enables them to focus all their efforts on delivering the best service possible to their clients. Covering seven distinct areas; Human Resources, Clients & Industries, Finance & Legal, Practice Support Services, Quality & Risk Services, IT Services, and Workplace Services & Real Estate, together we live, breathe and deliver the Deloitte experience. Location: Hyderabad                                                                                                                                         Work shift Timings: 9-hour shifts. Shift times will vary in accordance with business need.Shifts (India time): 01:00 PM to 10:00 PM/ 2:00 PM – 11:00 PM (IST)The team members should be willing to work in a rotating shift. Working on USI holidays and oncall during weekends when there is a business requirement.Specific ResponsibilitiesSystems administration and management            Customer liaison; Housekeeping and Documentation                                  Managing user lifecycle managementExecuting group management; Administering access rights managementExchange administration; IT security administration and enforcementProviding the business with best practice advice and supportDemonstrates excellent communication skills, both listening and verbal.Competent in written communication skills along with presentation skills.Able to effectively communicate technical issues with technical and non-technical audience.Required to project a professional image always and show an interest in the external industry.The TeamThe UK Internal Client Services includes teams focusing on Property & Corporate Services, Finance, Partner & Staff Services, Growth, IT Services, Human Resources and Shared Services. The I&AM/PAM is part of the IT Services Team which focuses primarily on user and systems administration and data access management.QualificationsRequired:Education (degree): Bachelor’s degree/College diploma in Computer Science or equivalent industry experience2+ years’ experience in Active Directory administration.  Understand and work on ‘preventing data leakage’ and ‘segregation of access’ through technologyExperience of using a ticketing system such as ServiceNow or HP Service Desk  Assist in the development of documentation and operational support.  Identify specific issues with migration or other directory technologies and have a basic understanding of how they interfaceAbility to communicate technical information to less experienced or non-specialist people, both verbally and in writingPreferredFamililar with PowerShell scripting and able to learn and build as per requirements. LDAP query, SQL scripting will be an added advantageExperience of the core Microsoft packages is essentialMust have good knowledge and experience of Microsoft infrastructure including, Active Directory, Exchange services and Folder Share Security Must have very good knowledge of Microsoft Outlook, Microsoft office suite products and Lotus Notes Experience in identity management is also required; ACL permissioning and managing large data/folder structuresContribute to, produce and maintain processes, procedures, operational documentation, Preferred Certifications (not a pre-requisite for the role):ITIL Foundation, Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate (MCSA) Azure fundamentals and AdministrationCloud Security fundamentalsCISMP, COMPTIA S+

Requisition code: 325054

Position Summary
                    








The USI BSO NSE ITS team develops Custom products, applications and services for Deloitte professionals globally. As a team we are here to delight customers by embracing design thinking, agility, innovation, and a customer first focus.Work you’ll doA MuleSoft Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining integration solutions using the MuleSoft Anypoint Platform. The role involves working closely with business analysts, project managers, and other developers to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.This position requires excellent interpersonal and communication skills. You will communicate, align with the business and report to the Technical Manager.Must be capable of working independently and collaboratively, demonstrated self-starter, with the ability to set the direction when there is little or no oversight. As a Technical Lead, should be able to coach, mentor & guide junior developers within the team.Responsibilities·       Design and develop integration solutions using MuleSoft Anypoint Platform.·       Collaborate with business analysts and stakeholders to understand integration requirements.·       Develop and maintain APIs, connectors, and integration flows.·       Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of integrations.·       Troubleshoot and resolve integration issues.·       Create and maintain technical documentation.·       Stay updated with the latest MuleSoft features and best practices.·       Work in an Agile environment and participate in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives.The teamAt Deloitte, we’re all about collaboration. And nowhere is this more apparent than among our 2,000-strong internal services team. With our combined specialist skills, we provide all the essential support and advice our client-facing colleagues need, right across the firm. This enables them to focus all their efforts on delivering the best service possible to their clients. Covering seven distinct areas; Human Resources, Clients & Industries, Finance & Legal, Practice Support Services, Quality & Risk Services, IT Services, and Workplace Services & Real Estate, together we live, breathe and deliver the Deloitte experience. Location: Hyderabad Work shift Timings: 11 AM to 8 PMQualificationsBachelor of Engineering/ Bachelor of TechnologyRequired Skills & Desired Experience:·       Proficiency in MuleSoft Anypoint Platform, including Anypoint Studio, API Manager, and Runtime Manager.·       Strong understanding of RESTful and SOAP web services.·       Experience with DataWeave for data transformation.·       Knowledge of RAML or OpenAPI for API design.·       Familiarity with various MuleSoft connectors and components.·       Experience with message queuing technologies (e.g., JMS, RabbitMQ).·       Understanding of integration patterns and best practices.·       Proficiency in Java or other programming languages.·       Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git). Familiarity with various      MuleSoft connectors and components (e.g., SFTP, VM, DataBase) Experience with Anypoint      Monitoring (log search). Experience with message queuing      technologies (e.g., JMS, AnypointMQ). ·       Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.·       Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.·       Ability to work independently and as part of a team.·       Attention to detail and a commitment to quality.·       Adaptability and willingness to learn new technologies.Preferred Qualifications:·       MuleSoft Certified Developer certification.·       Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure).·       Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools (e.g., Jenkins, Docker).·       Experience with CI/CD pipelines.·       Understanding of security best practices in integration.Languages ·       Fluent in English

Requisition code: 325051

Position Summary
                    








Senior Analyst – AEM developer - Deloitte Support Services India Private LimitedWe are seeking an experienced Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Developer with 5–8 years of overall experience and strong hands-on AEM expertise to design, build, and support scalable digital experiences. The role requires deep knowledge of AEM authoring/runtime, Sling/OSGi, JCR, component-based development, integrations, and CI/CD. You’ll work closely with product owners, architects, backend teams, and designers to deliver production-grade solutions.Key Responsibilities:With 3-6 years of hands-on experience developing applications leveraging the following skills. Possess      good understanding and hands on experience on complete software      development life cycle Able to      Develop and execute software requirements, designing, coding, enhance and      improve the existing architecture/design under minimal supervision Sound      Technical knowledge, Investigation, and troubleshooting Coordinates      with internal stakeholders:   Work item       ownership Validation       / verification of task completion Relationships       for involved teams Communication       points among teams Deadlines       and work effort completions Impact of       met / missed deadlines on deliverables and consumers  Actively      seeks guidance for prioritization and review of deliverables Result-oriented      with strong analytical skills and a proven approach to problem solving   Experience       in Adobe Experience Manager (formerly Adobe CQ5)  Background and Skills: Strong      technical expertise on AEM as a cloud or AEM 6 and above Good      Knowledge on developing components and templates using Sightly (HTL) Deep level      understanding of Java. Experience      working with and understanding of the following: JCR, Apache, Apache      Felix, OSGi and JS frameworks Good      Knowledge of Java/J2EE JS, HTML5, CSS3 and related technologies Experience      working with REST, Sling in a production environment Integrating      with third party services Experience      in Maven and Git is a must Comfortable      with data exchange protocols like JSON and XML Experience      with unit testing frameworks, such as JUnit Excellent      problem solving and analytical skills Experience      and desire to work within a fast-paced, iterative development environment;      experience with Agile a strong plus Strong      communication skills Able to      work independently as well as collaborates and supports team members. Provides      on-going support to business and demonstrates flexibility and adaptability Performs      other job-related duties as assigned. The teamAt Deloitte, we’re all about collaboration. And nowhere is this more apparent than among our 2,000-strong internal services team. With our combined specialist skills, we provide all the essential support and advice our client-facing colleagues need, right across the firm. This enables them to focus all of their efforts on delivering the best service possible to their clients. Location: Hyderabad Work shift Timings: 12 Noon to 9 PMQualifications·       Bachelor of Engineering/ Bachelor of Technology·       5-8 years’ experience in a similar role and Enterprise organisation.How you’ll growAt Deloitte, we’ve invested a great deal to create a rich environment in which our professionals can grow. We want all our people to develop in their own way, playing to their own strengths as they hone their leadership skills. And, as a part of our efforts, we provide our professionals with a variety of learning and networking opportunities—including exposure to leaders, sponsors, coaches, and challenging assignments—to help accelerate their careers along the way. Requisition code: 325048

Position Summary
                    








Manager - Product/ Application ArchitectRole Overview: As a Product Architect, you will actively engage in your software architecture craft, taking a hands-on approach to multiple high-visibility projects. Your expertise will be pivotal in delivering solutions that delight customers and users, while also driving tangible value for Deloitte's business investments. You will leverage your extensive engineering craftsmanship and advanced proficiency across multiple programming languages and modern frameworks, consistently demonstrating your exemplary track record in delivering high-quality, outcome-focused solutions. The ideal candidate will be a role model and engineering mentor, collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy advanced software solutions.Key Responsibilities:Outcome-Driven Accountability: Embrace and drive a culture of accountability for customer and business outcomes. Develop engineering solutions that solve complex problems with valuable outcomes, ensuring high-quality, lean designs and implementations.Technical Leadership and Advocacy: Serve as the technical advocate for products, ensuring architectural integrity, feasibility, and alignment with business and customer goals, NFRs, and applicable architecture and engineering standards—being responsible for product architecture blueprints, high-level architecture designs (e.g., “4+1 model” or relevant others), and integration architecture into the technical landscape and technology stack.Engineering Craftsmanship: Possess passion and experience as an individual contributor, responsible for the engineering designs and technical feasibility of solutions, being hands-on with design, configuration and code part of the time, contributing to team velocity. Actively get engaged with engineers to ensure architecture is understood and can be implemented, working with them closely during sprints, helping resolve any technical issues through to production operations: reviewing code, actively driving technology debt reduction, and helping drive engineering quality. Be self-driven to learn new technologies, experiment with engineers, and inspire the team to learn and drive application of those new technologies.Customer-Centric Engineering: Develop lean engineering solutions through rapid, inexpensive experimentation to solve customer needs. Engage with customers and product teams to deliver the right architectural solution for the product in the right way at the right time.Incremental and Iterative Delivery: Exhibit a mindset that favors action and evidence over extensive planning. Utilize a leaning-forward approach to navigate complexity and uncertainty, delivering lean, supportable, and maintainable solutions.Cross-Functional Collaboration and Integration: Work collaboratively with empowered, cross-functional teams including product management, experience, delivery, infrastructure, and security. Integrate diverse perspectives to make well-informed decisions that balance feasibility, viability, usability, and value. Foster a collaborative environment that enhances team synergy and innovation.Advanced Technical Proficiency: Possess deep expertise in modern software engineering practices and principles, including OOD/OOP, Agile methodologies, DevSecOps, Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment, deployment techniques like Blue-Green, Canary to minimize down-time and enable A/B testing approaches. Act as a Role-Model, leveraging these techniques to optimize solutioning and product delivery, ensuring high-quality outcomes with minimal waste. Demonstrate proficiency in product development, from conceptualization and design to implementation and scaling, with a focus on continuous improvement and learning.Domain Expertise: Quickly acquire domain-specific knowledge relevant to the business or product. Translate business/user needs and UX/UI designs into technical requirements and designs. Navigate various enterprise functions such as business and enabling areas as well as product, experience, delivery, infrastructure, and security to drive product value and feasibility as well as alignment with organizational goals.Effective Communication and Influence: Exhibit exceptional communication skills, capable of articulating complex technical concepts clearly and compellingly. Inspire and influence stakeholders at all levels through well-structured arguments and trade-offs supported by evidence, evaluations, and research. Create coherent narratives that align technical solutions with business objectives.Engagement and Collaborative Co-Creation: Engage and collaborate with stakeholders at all organizational levels, from team members to senior executives. Build and maintain constructive relationships, fostering a culture of co-creation and shared momentum towards achieving product goals. Align diverse perspectives and drive consensus to create feasible solutions.The team: US Deloitte Technology Product Engineering has modernized software and product delivery, creating a scalable, cost-effective model that focuses on value/outcomes that leverages a progressive and responsive talent structure. As Deloitte’s primary internal development team, Product Engineering delivers innovative digital solutions to businesses, service lines, and internal operations with proven bottom-line results and outcomes. It helps power Deloitte’s success. It is the engine that drives Deloitte, serving many of the world’s largest, most respected companies. We develop and deploy cutting-edge internal and go-to-market solutions that help Deloitte operate effectively and lead in the market. Our reputation is built on a tradition of delivering with excellence.Key Qualifications:§  A bachelor’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related discipline. An advanced degree (e.g., MS) is preferred but not required. Experience is the most relevant factor.§  Excellent software engineering and product architecture/design foundation with deep understanding of Business Context Diagrams (BCD), sequence/activity/state/ER/DFD diagrams, OOP/OOD, data-structures, algorithms, code instrumentations, etc.§  10+ years proven experience with programming languages like Angular, React, NodeJS, Python, Streamlit, C#, .NET Core, Golang, SQL/NoSQL, unit testing frameworks with 5 years’ experience in architecting enterprise solutions.§  5+ years of hands-on experience with cloud-native engineering, using FaaS/PaaS/micro-services on cloud hyper-scalers like Azure, AWS, and GCP.§  3+ years of experience with AI/ML and GenAI is preferred.§  Deep understanding of methodologies & tools like, XP, Lean, SAFe, DevSecOps, SRE, ADO, GitHub, SonarQube, etc. to deliver high quality products rapidly.§  Excellent interpersonal and organizational skills, with the ability to handle diverse situations, complex projects, and changing priorities, behaving with passion, empathy, and care.How You will Grow: At Deloitte, our professional development plans focus on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths to do their best work every day and excel in everything they do.#CAL-BMT#CA-PS#CAL-PD#pxeengineering

Position Summary
                    








Delivery ManagerJob DescriptionOverview:As a Delivery Manager, you will lead the end-to-end delivery of projects, ensuring effective outcomes and significant business impact through strategic collaboration, clear communication, and alignment with business goals. Your leadership will be pivotal in managing cross-functional teams, optimizing delivery processes, and fostering a customer-centric approach. You will drive continuous improvement, engage stakeholders, and develop high-quality solutions that are delivered on time and within budget. The ideal candidate will be a leader and mentor, committed to achieving excellence and driving success for Product Engineering's clients and business investments.Responsibilities: Deliver the right customer and business outcomes by engaging with product teams to ensure proper structure, skills, leverage models and metrics for measurement. Champion delivery using methodologies like Agile, SAFe, Kanban, Waterfall. Etc., Work with Product Managers to drive priorities and execution. Customize delivery methods to varied contexts, form skilled teams, and remove roadblocks.  Foster excellence within delivery teams by ensuring quality processes and standards. Engage in program value delivery and team growth. Learn and experiment with new techniques/tools like GenAI. Spread knowledge through community sessions and provide examples of achieving quality solutions. Exhibit excellent communication skills to inspire and influence stakeholders. Serve as the contact for value achievement and collaborate with product engineering teams. Facilitate co-creation workshops to foster alignment and decision-making. Work collaboratively with product, experience, engineering, infrastructure, security/risk, and other cross functional teams. Manage conflicts and foster a collaborative environment to enhance team synergy and innovation. Enable cross-skilling to create a versatile team. Demonstrate expertise in SDLC methodologies (Waterfall, Agile, SAFe, Lean, Kanban, XP). Engage in continuous planning and refinement, ensuring quality processes. Collaborate with teams to identify risks, adapt scope, and drive optimization. Embed continuous improvement and problem-solving. Drive lean solutions through rapid experimentation. Engage with customers before, during, and after delivery to ensure the right solution is delivered effectively. Ensure inclusive and diverse team composition, drive engagement, remove obstacles, and perform coaching. Improve employee satisfaction and reduce attrition. Review and report on financials, innovation, and team engagement. Drive efficiency and productivity improvements. Engage stakeholders at all levels, build relationships, and foster a culture of co-creation. Align diverse perspectives to deliver quality solutions. Quickly acquire domain-specific knowledge and navigate enterprise functions to drive product value and align with organizational goals.The TeamUS Deloitte Technology Product Engineering has modernized software and product delivery, creating a scalable, cost-effective model that focuses on value/outcomes that leverages a progressive and responsive talent structure. As Deloitte’s primary internal development team, Product Engineering delivers innovative digital solutions to businesses, service lines, and internal operations with proven bottom-line results and outcomes. We develop and deploy cutting-edge internal and go-to-market solutions that help Deloitte operate effectively and lead in the market. Our reputation is built on a tradition of delivering with excellence.Qualifications: 10+ years in IT project and delivery management, managing large projects, and leading cross-functional teams, including experience in a multi-geographical setup. Proficiency in SDLC methodologies (Agile, SAFe, Kanban, Waterfall, XP) and PM tools.Strong leadership capabilities with Customer-centric mindset. How You will Grow:  At Deloitte, we’ve invested a great deal to create a rich environment in which our professionals can grow. We want all our people to develop in their own way, playing to their own strengths as they hone their leadership skills. And, as a part of our efforts, we provide our professionals with a variety of learning and networking opportunities— including exposure to leaders, sponsors, coaches, and challenging assignments—to help accelerate their careers along the way. No two people learn in exactly the same way. So, we provide a range of resources including live classrooms, team-based learning, and eLearning. Requisition code: 325046

Position Summary
                    








 #ProductEngineeringFY26Manager - Engineering Manager, Product Engineering  The Engineering Manager is an integral part of the technical application development team and primarily responsible for building and delivering the enterprise IT solutions. This position provides opportunity to lead and manage projects and programs for internal IT organization. Engineering manager is a hands-on technical manager managing significant strategic and technical aspect of projects and programs, including communications with Leadership, leading multifunctional teams, quality, and adherence to Deloitte standards.  Work you’ll do A unique opportunity to be a part of growing Delivery, methods & Tools team that drives consistency, quality, and efficiency of the services delivered to stakeholders. You will be responsible for delivering applications build on Microsoft technology to support US Member firm.  Development: ·       Responsible for providing technical leadership to application development efforts to meet and or exceed client expectations. ·       Responsible for practicing Agile principle on project execution. ·       Responsible for conducting effective requirement planning sessions and application design sessions with cross functional groups. ·       Responsible for leading and directing the technical tasks to the team. ·       Ensures successful development and application support strategy is implemented. ·       Encourages collaborative efforts and camaraderie with on-shore and off-shore team members. ·       Demonstrates a working understanding software development processes  ·       Demonstrates a strong working understanding of industry best standards in software development and version controlling. ·       Ensures the quality and low bug rates of code released into production. ·       Work with Engagement Manager on managing the team, projects and products of the Portfolio. ·       Should be able to resolve team’s technical queries and do code reviews.  Support: ·       This role is expected to generally work in India business hours with occasional off-hours status meetings with the onshore team ·       During design and key development phases this role may need to work a staggered shift from 11-8pm to ensure appropriate overlap with the India/US team  The team At Deloitte, Shared Services center improves overall efficiency and control while giving every business unit access to the company’s best and brightest resources. It is also lets business units focus on what really matters – satisfying customers and developing new products and services to sustain competitive advantage. A shared services center is a simple concept but making it work is anything but easy. It involves consolidating and standardizing a wildly diverse collection of systems, processes, and functions. And if requires a high degree of cooperation among business units that generally are not accustomed to working together – with people who do not necessarily want to change.  USI shared services team provides a wide array of services to the U.S. and it is constantly evaluating and expanding its portfolio. The shared services team provides call center support, Document Services support, financial processing and analysis support, Record management support, Ethics and compliance support and admin assistant support.  QualificationsRequired:·       Education qualification: BE /B Tech ( IT/CS/Electronics) / MCA / MSc Computer science·       10+ years of IT experience in application development, support, or maintenance activities·       4+ years of team management experience(technically)·       Must have experience on at least 2 full life cycle of software development. ·       Hands on experience on ASP.NET , C# , HTML , CSS , JavaScript , React / Angular, SQL server and Microsoft AzurePreferred:·       2+ years of experiencing in Agile / scrum methodology.·       Client facing and exposure to onshore offshore delivery model.·       Experience in working in a global environment involving multiple development sites on various time zones.Shift Timings: 11AM to 8PMLocation: Hyderabad #CAP-PCJ

Requisition code: 325045

Position Summary
                    








Network Architect- Asst Mgr. Job Description The Technology and Infrastructure organization is bringing innovation to the forefront of the business. Architecting cutting edge technology solutions and evolving legacy platforms to modern architectures is a business imperative. Network Architect will identify, evaluate, architect and recommend best of breed technology approaches to solve the business and customer problems, aligned with proper architecture standards and best practices. This role will interface directly with Deloitte customers and internal stakeholders to gather requirements, deliver solutions, identify and deliver incremental revenue opportunities. This role entails overseeing the Infrastructure and network architecture functions to ensure timely, efficient and quality designs aligned to the strategic direction set out by the office of the CTO. Role Specific Responsibilities •	Work across teams, and external customer groups to develop strategy, design solutions, and advise implementation teams during deployment. •	Deliver guidance, best practices, and other assistance to prospects, new engagements, member firms, and clients. •	Build and maintain technical relationships with managers of the organization, other businesses, member firms, clients, and technology providers by leading and facilitating technology discussions and aligning solutions with client needs. •	Provide communication, ensuring that managers, team members, stakeholders within the organization, and clients are kept informed of relevant trends and projects. •	Research new or alternative technologies, document findings, conduct pilots and evaluate multiple vendors, make recommendations, and develop business cases to justify the investment. •	Participate in the organization’s strategic planning, identifying strategic initiatives, quantifying their benefits through a business case, and advocating for inclusion in the organization’s program portfolio. •	Deal with escalations. Make assessments, recommendations or provide solutions to resolve issues. •	In partnership with managers and others in the organization, mentor and train staff, ensuring they are up to speed on critical processes and technologies related to the Technology and Infrastructure (T&I) organizations’ goals and soft skills needed to succeed. •	Occasional traveling for meetings and overseeing projects may be required. •	Additional duties as assigned. Qualifications: •	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, or equivalent. •	Cisco Certified Network professional (CCNP) preferred •	Minimum 7-8 years of experience designing technology solutions in increasingly complex environments. •	Experience as a network architect, integrator, etc. interfacing with clients and internal stakeholder groups. •	Strong interpersonal skills as demonstrated by extensive prior experience working effectively with clients, within teams, and in a matrixed environment; viewed as a thought leader and influencer within their organization. •	Expert-level understanding of dynamic routing protocols (OSPF, BGP, EIGRP), IPv6, Multicast, STP, Fabricpath, VPC, VDC, OTV, TCP/IP. •	Experience with the following technologies: Hyper-Converged Infrastructure (HCI), Software-Defined Networking (SDN), VxLAN, MPLS, VPLS, DNS, DHCP, VDI, 802.1x, system/network/storage/security components, and other related programs; Ability to learn new systems as needed. •	Experience with Cisco NXOS, IOS XE, IOS XR. Cisco AS100X, Nexus 9336, 93180, 9504 etc. •	Experience with enterprise wireless. Wireless Controllers and Access Point, 802.11n, 802.11ac, 802.11ax, Guess Wireless, etc. •	Experience with Cisco Application Centric Infrastructure (ACI). •	Experience with public cloud networks (Azure, AWS, GCP) a plus •	Experience with cloud security (Any cloud platform)  •	Experience with network automation (Python, PowerShell, etc.) a plus. •	Excellent problem-solving skills in multiple complex operating environments. •	Proven ability to make decisions or tradeoffs among alternatives with limited information to meet emerging or current opportunities. •	Strong organizational skills; Ability to prioritize and meet multiple deadlines. •	Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment. •	Ability to research new or alternative technologies. •	Strong verbal and written communication skills. Must Have •	CCNP - Routing & Switching •	CCNA – Security Good to have  •	Knowledge on Multicasting •	Knowledge on QoS •	TIL Foundation V3 Work Location: Bengaluru  How you’ll grow At Deloitte, we’ve invested a great deal to create a rich environment in which our professionals can grow. jobTitle: Senior Analyst – Operations, Data, Reporting & Insights
jobDescription:
Position Summary
                    








    Senior Analyst   – Operations, Data, Reporting & Insights – Digital Data Analytics Innovation – Deloitte Support   Services India Private Limited  Key   Responsibilities:  Process        Ownership & Execution:        Lead, oversee, and optimize key operational processes across daily,        weekly, quarterly, and annual cycles, guaranteeing accuracy, compliance,        and continuous improvement. End-to-End        Automation Accountability:   Implement   and sustain robust automated processes, ensuring operational excellence   throughout the lifecycle and identifying enhancements for efficiency and   scalability.  Advanced        Troubleshooting & Optimization:   Diagnose,   debug, and optimize complex SQL stored procedures, views, and other data   solutions, delivering actionable recommendations and resolutions for   sophisticated technical challenges.  Collaborative        Problem Solving: Partner with        development and business teams to bridge technical and operational gaps,        fostering effective troubleshooting and resolution of cross-functional        issues. Comprehensive        Documentation & Training:   Develop   and refine detailed process documentation and innovative training materials,   promoting operational continuity, team self-sufficiency, and effective   knowledge transfer.  Strategic        Time Management: Exhibit superior        organizational and prioritization skills, consistently managing multiple        high-impact projects and competing deadlines. Stakeholder        Engagement: Interface confidently with        stakeholders, presenting analytical findings, strategic insights, and        tailored recommendations to drive informed decision-making. Process        Excellence & Innovation:        Proactively review and assess existing business processes to identify        improvements and drive innovative changes. Project        Coordination & Leadership:        Analyze project requirements for enhancements and optimization,        collaborate closely with project leads, and ensure end-to-end execution        meets objectives, timelines, and quality standards. Proactive        Stakeholder Communication:        Provide timely, anticipatory updates to stakeholders, proactively        addressing risks, bottlenecks, and information needs for optimal        engagement and outcomes. Quality        Assurance & Peer Leadership:        Lead rigorous peer reviews of deliverables produced by Associate        Analysts, Analysts, and peer Senior Analysts, upholding accuracy,        compliance, and Deloitte best practices. Mentorship        & Team Development:        Act as a mentor and coach for junior team members, facilitating skill        development and elevating the collective quality of client deliverables.   ·       Continuous   Learning & Strategic Foresight: o     Upskill on new   technologies and implement it to enhance the existing processes. o     Build a strong   understanding of global systems and client-focused data structures. Use this   knowledge to find helpful insights and share them with the team to help   discover new ways to add value for the business.  o     Actively update user   stories and tasks in Azure DevOps, contributing to transparent, agile project   management and prompt delivery. o     Provide daily updates and   progress reports to Product Owner/Scrum Master, driving seamless team   alignment.    Required   Qualification: ·         Bachelor’s degree in a   related field required, e.g., Data Analytics, Computer Science ·         Lateral hires. ·         3-6 years’ relevant experience.  Required Skills:    Proven experience in designing, writing, and optimizing complex queries   within MS SQL Server or comparable relational databases. Skilled in   supporting data-driven solutions through robust query logic and performance   tuning.   Hands-on experience with data integration and automation platforms such as   SSIS or Azure Data Factory (preferred), including development,   troubleshooting, and process optimization.   Practical experience building and enhancing dashboards in visual analytics   platforms, particularly Tableau (preferred), to translate complex datasets   into actionable business insights.   In-depth working knowledge of Microsoft Office tools, with advanced   capability in Excel (including formulas and VBA automation), as well as   practical use of Access for database solutions and workflow enhancements.   Demonstrated strength in problem-solving and analytical reasoning, combined   with clear, professional communication skills across written, verbal, and   presentation formats. Capable of tailoring messaging for stakeholders at all   organizational levels.   Location: Hyderabad Work timings: 2 PM - 11 PM (IST)  How   you’ll grow At Deloitte, we’ve invested a great deal   to create a rich environment in which our professionals can grow. And, as a part of our efforts, we provide our   professionals with a variety of learning and networking opportunities — including   exposure to leaders, sponsors, coaches, and challenging assignments — to help   accelerate their careers along the way.
